column4: I have an SD card when i wanted to mount second time it didnot i am suspecting a process linked to it that i need to kill but which one ? I dont want to restart my PC
I mean when i insert it it should auto mount. dmesg doesnot show anything
only one hour ago it was mounted and did some file transfer then i removed it to other pc now i brought it back and it doesnot mount
did you remember to eject your usb device before you unpluged?
